Title: Orruk Boarboys
Intro: Each model in an Orruk Boarboys unit is armed with one of the following weapon options: Choppa; or Boarboy Spear. All models in the unit must be armed with the same weapon option.

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit’s War Boars are each armed with Jagged Tusks.

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be an Orruk Boarboy Boss. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s melee weapon.

Rules.Name: Standard Bearer
Rules.Rule: STANDARD BEARER: 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Glyph Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of this unit if it includes any Glyph Bearers.

Rules.Name: Musician
Rules.Rule: MUSICIAN: 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Waaagh! Hornblower. Add 1 to charge rolls for this unit if it includes any Waaagh! Hornblowers.

Rules.Name: Boarboy Charge
Rules.Rule: ABILITIES Add 1 wound rolls for attacks made with a Boarboy Spear or Jagged Tusks if the attacking unit made a charge move in the same turn.
